summary: Headline In Tomorrow’s Papers
title: Headline In Tomorrow’s Papers
body:
Headline In Tomorrow’s Papers: This weekend, a K-pop group named BTS was on Saturday Night Live. They continue to take the world by storm, while Duran Duran hasn’t been on SNL since 1983. Food for thought.

Happy Monday. Today marks the beginning of Spring Break for us. The youngest and I have this week off of school, and I can spend time thinking and doing something other than teaching. This has been a rough year. A move combined with changing schools twice, I can’t say that fifth grade has been great, but my girl is trying her best, and I think she likes her new school for the most part. Me? I…

View On WordPress

blog.name: tinysilverbird
blog.title: I'm the one I should love
blog.description: Amy | Germany | Who am I kidding anymore this is a BTS blog lmao (Jin and Tae own my heart but the other five regularly steal it and play frisbee) | still have love in my heart for Niall, Zayn and Louis | some Marvel, Harry Potter, animals and other random stuff in between | I love everything that's pretty and nice | this is all my sister's fault

summary: Hello, every once in a while I do one of these but promise this is the only time you have to hear about this - but if you love...
body: Hello, every once in a while I do one of these but promise this is the only time you have to hear about this - but if you love vmin and are interested in a short, partly sad but mostly soft story about them then pls check out this one. I worked quite hard on it and tbh I really love it, I think it’s my favourite I’ve written. It would mean a lot to me ☺️🙈

summary: Early mornings
title: Early mornings
body:
Genre: Fluff

Word count: 712

Ship: Min Yoongi x reader

A/N: I finally caved and made a kpop blog, it’ll be an awkward mix of reblogs and writing!

I turned over in the bed, trying to avoid the bright sun breaking through the edges of the curtains by squinting during the brief moment of facing the window. It wasn’t until I bumped into someone that I realised I wasn’t alone this morning. Most mornings I’d be briefly woken up by Yoongi’s alarm before receiving a kiss on the forehead as he snuck around to get ready, leaving me to fall back asleep. It was his day off. I smiled softly, taking in his features as I let him get his much-needed rest, the small bump hardly affecting his deep sleep.

The light made his blonde hair glow, the years of damage invisible under the bright rays that had squeezed past my shadow. It was shocking how soft his hair was after all the bleach and dyes and it looked so fluffy in the mornings that it took all my self-control not to reach out and run my fingers through it to smooth it out again. His mouth hung slightly open with a tiny bit of drool attempting to peek out of the corner of his mouth. The dark circles under his eyes were still there, just slightly hidden by his eyelashes and a good night’s sleep. I hated how little rest he got. He had most of his skin covered by the duvet as he had tugged it right up under his chin after I disrupted it, allowing the cold to seep in a little. He looked so content being snuggled up under the duvet.

“I know you’re looking at me” He grumbled, his voice hoarse from not being used.

I felt my cheeks turn pink as he rested his hand on my hip, slipping it under his shirt that I was wearing. His thumb drew small circles on my bare skin as a soft smile appeared on his face, his eyes still shut as he gently pulled me closer to him. I pressed a kiss to his lips before finally allowing myself to smooth out his bed hair as best I could while we were lying down. A light sigh drifted from his lips as he opened his eyes at last.

“I wish we could wake up like this every morning,” Yoongi whispered.

“Me too, just without the part where it’s 7am” I peered over his shoulder at the clock on his bedside table. “We crashed so early we woke up ridiculously early for a day off.”

“I don’t mind it if I get to spend more time with you, we can have a nap later.” He kissed my forehead like he usually did before kissing my nose and finally my lips.

We both turned our heads as we heard the door to the room next door closing, in a quiet house even the slightest noise in the hallways was noticed. It was Jin coming out of his room to go make coffee and his own breakfast probably. He was the only early riser of the group and tended to use this to his advantage on days off so he wouldn’t have to make 8 breakfasts.

“Want to go see if Jin wants ‘help’ with breakfast?” I asked, prying myself out of his grip so I could go see if I could get myself some minimal effort food. I watched as Yoongi tucked himself back into the bed. “I’m not bringing you any if you go back to sleep.”

“I’ll go if you put on some shorts first.” He stated, well aware that this shirt could easily ride up to show my underwear.

“I’m doing it.” I giggle, wriggling into the first pair of shorts in my drawer which would still be too short for his liking but I skipped downstairs anyway.

I walked into the kitchen just as Jin was making a pot of coffee. Perfect timing. He was still shirtless himself, none of the boys really bothered getting properly dressed anymore while I was here. It’d been 5 years and they’d gotten used to my presence.

“You’re up early.” Jin greeted, getting two cups out of the cupboard and pausing before getting out a third, realising I’d need one for the grumpy boy upstairs. “Pancakes?”

“I’d prefer waffles.” Yoongi grumbled, wrapping his arms around you from behind.

blog.name: sandwich-21
blog.title: I'm so sick of this fake love

summary: Я скажу тебе искренне:
body:
Я скажу тебе искренне:

Временами я был немного заносчив,

(Высокое небо, полные огромные залы)

Иногда я молился о том, чтобы убежать,

Но твоя боль — моя боль.

Когда я осознал это, я дал клятву себе:

На крыльях Икара, которые ты подарила мне

Но не навстречу Солнцу, а навстречу тебе

Разреши мне взлететь

BTS, Boy with luv.

blog.title: Hwagae Market
blog.description: This blog is an AUTOMATED blog that uses an IFTTT algorithm to instantly post fics posted under the relationship: Jung Hoseok|J-Hope/Min Yoongi|Suga tag on ao3. The owner of this blog (hoseokie-jung) only logs in to delete things that don't belong (rp requests, other ships, etc) once every couple of months because she has a terrible memory and forgets that this is, in fact, her blog.

summary: You can do it hyung!
title: You can do it hyung!
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2VMr8nU

by Shikzu_ultimate

Maybe…c- cupcake? Hell no erase that. Uh… Cake? I mean… It’s sweet right? Hoseok’s sweet so does it..? Nope.

Yoongi let out a groan and leaned back in his chair. Why the hell was coming up with nicknames so difficult? It’s not like it was HIS idea anyway so why was he forced to suffer this way?

Words: 594, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 9 of Bangtan Sonyeondan

summary: Hard Feelings (of Love)
title: Hard Feelings (of Love)
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Dey3il

by Potatogirrrl

It would have been selfish of him to say that he was lonely – he has always had Namjoon and Seokjin but Taehyung was different, he was like a breeze of fresh air and his presence –

“Are you Min Yoongi?” His pity party has been interrupted by a somewhat shy voice so he straightened his back in order to look more presentable, his cat-like eyes studying the face of the stranger. The heart-shaped smile stole the show but dark browns followed his every trait, their owner’s lips twitching slightly at the pointy ears that were peeking from under blonde curls. The boy looked a bit intimidated so Yoongi reminded himself to nod once as to answer to the previous question. “Your art is amazing, I always come to these exhibitions to look at your works alone.” The boy rubbed the back of his neck awkwardly. “I’m sorry –”

OR

The story in which Yoongi allows himself to feel and learns that love doesn’t have to hurt

Words: 5040, Chapters: 1/5, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 방탄소년단 | Bangtan Boys | BTS
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Min Yoongi | Suga, Jung Hoseok | J-Hope
  • Relationships: Jung Hoseok | J-Hope/Min Yoongi | Suga, Jung Hoseok | J-Hope & Min Yoongi | Suga
